summary:
**Meeting Overview**:  
The Government Performance and Financial Management Committee of the Dallas City Council will convene on November 14, 2023, at 1:00 PM in the Council Chambers and via video conference. The meeting aims to address various updates and proposals related to city management and financial oversight.

**Key Agenda Items**:  
1. Approval of minutes from the October 23, 2023, meeting.
2. Monthly updates on Development Services, including process improvements.
3. Updates to Personnel Rules.
4. Presentation of the recommended 2024 External Audit Work Plan.
5. Discussion on city-wide real estate issues and opportunities.

**Important Details**:  
- The meeting will include a briefing on the two-month financial forecast and budget accountability report as of September 30, 2023.
- A technology accountability report will be presented, detailing information as of October 31, 2023.
- The State Fair of Texas financial report for the years ending December 31, 2022, and 2021 will also be reviewed.
- The Office of the City Auditor will provide updates on internal audit reports and present the recommended 2024 Annual Internal Audit Plan.
- Discussion on the 2025 Legislative Priorities is scheduled.

**Action Items**:  
The committee seeks approval for the minutes from the previous meeting and will review and discuss the proposed updates and plans, including the External Audit Work Plan and the Annual Internal Audit Plan. Decisions regarding the cityâ€™s legislative priorities and real estate opportunities may also be made during the meeting.
